jeksterslabRlib 1.0.0

Extract Calibre Metadata

Source: R/lib_metadata_calibre.R
lib_metadata_calibre.Rd

Extracts metadata using Calibre's fetch-ebook-metadata command with the argument --identifier isbn:ITEM_ISBN.

lib_metadata_calibre(isbn, par = TRUE, ncores = NULL)

Arguments

isbn

Character vector. International Standard Book Number.
par

Logical. If TRUE, use multiple cores.
ncores

Integer. Number of cores to use if par = TRUE. If unspecified, defaults to detectCores() - 1.

Examples

isbn <- c(
  "978-0-387-98141-3",
  "978-0-387-71762-3"
)
lib_metadata_calibre(
  isbn = isbn,
  par = FALSE
)
#>      isbn            title                                   
#> [1,] "9780387981413" "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>"
#> [2,] "9780387717623" "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>"
#>      description                                                                                     
#> [1,] "<package xmlns=\"http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf\" unique-identifier=\"uuid_id\" version=\"2.0\">"
#> [2,] "<package xmlns=\"http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf\" unique-identifier=\"uuid_id\" version=\"2.0\">"
#>      subject                                                                                                  
#> [1,] "    <metadata xmlns:dc=\"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/\" xmlns:opf=\"http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf\">"
#> [2,] "    <metadata xmlns:dc=\"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/\" xmlns:opf=\"http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf\">"
#>      amazon google         uuid                                  
#> [1,] NA     "bes-AAAAQBAJ" "63650a6a-d868-464d-9f05-28350bc3dbb6"
#> [2,] NA     "sC0Ij2r_KLcC" "b0b7f280-120a-479d-a4ae-0746e9f5410f"
#>      calibre                               
#> [1,] "8dccda73-26fb-48b8-821d-5f7a1b6b2559"
#> [2,] "1ad36fd7-6f10-41dc-af66-40312eecaaf4"
